basics.name: Juan Manuel Bécares
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Computer scientist passionate about creating impactful projects. Focus on frontend and interested in everything.

work.name: TUI
work.summary: Leading frontend data projects, ensuring integration between frontends, data lakes, and AI solutions. Tech stack: Vue, Nuxt, TypeScript, AWS, GitLab CI/CD.
highlights: Developed framework-independent libraries and managed Node.js compatibility.
Implemented GitLab CI/CD pipelines and utilized AWS services (Firehose, Lambda).
Optimized data flow and scalability for AI-driven solutions like chatbots.

work.name: TUI
work.summary: Frontend development with Vue/Nuxt, TypeScript, and Node.js.
highlights: Developed pure native libraries and integrations with Vue 2-3 and microfrontends.
Main developer for data analytics and AI connections.
Managed NPM registries and unit testing with Jest.

work.name: ExperiencelT
work.summary: Working on HCIS web system for the medical sector in Spain Frontend mainly with pure native solutions.
highlights: Creating standard ways to develop software, principles SOLID and new features from ES6.
Develop native web components to improve JSP applications.
Reviewing all code project from MR of Junior to ensure everything is correct using TortoiseSVN.

work.name: Grupo Global Exchange
work.summary: Developed frontend solutions with Freemarker, Vue, SignalR and .net.
highlights: Creating full stack web applications with .net, AngularJS and introducing Vue.
Managing connection on Microsoft SQL Server with stored procedures.
Leading projects using real-time experiences like a tablet to support the money exchange on the customer side with a multi-language chat with voice.

project.name: JOME
project.description: A Home Automation system to automate light, doors, covers and more, using cable with the protocol RS485 using a Raspberry Pi and Arduino. All the configuration is done using a modern web with Vue and Parse server including a basic debugger with web.

projects.name: Hotelier Tools
projects.description: Improve Little Hotelier to automate hotel operations. Detect errors and inconsistencies. Improve the current Web page with new features. Detect errors and inconsistencies. Generate bulk invoices and download. Mark paid reservations from external sources.

projects.name: 720 DeGiro
projects.description: Create Model 720 for the Spanish tax declaration in 5 minutes. Just Export your DeGiro data and upload it. Guide included.

projects.name: Bus Salamanca Alexa Skill
projects.description: Alexa Skill to get time to arrive next buses on Salamanca. Configure your closest bus stops and ask Alexa for arrival times.
